title: Star Chart’s Edge - Novel Updates
tags: Body Tempering   Cryostasis   Female Protagonist   Futuristic Setting   Outer Space   Tomboyish Female Lead   Wars
author: Dark Circles   黑眼圈先森
description:
An interplanetary spaceship began a journey fraught with crisis and uncertainty one thousand years ago, burdened with humanities hopes and dreams...
An ordinary woman followed that journey, experiencing a baptism of friendship, kinship and passion that allowed her to understand human nature through death and separation.>
